title: Rocinante Trojan Poses as Banking Apps to Steal Sensitive Data from Brazilian Android Users
description: Mobile users in Brazil are the target of a new malware campaign that delivers a new Android banking trojan named Rocinante. "This malware family is capable of performing keylogging using the Accessibility Service, and is also able to steal PII from its victims using phishing screens posing as different banks," Dutch security company ThreatFabric said.
